metadata.description: Structured ability data for all Unrivalable heroes

main_attack.name: What goes forth
main_attack.description: Throws random objects from his inventory at enemies. If he misses, they stay on the ground

ability_1.name: Must come back
ability_1.description: When triggered, all items thrown zip back to him

ability_2.name: Big Ol Boomerang
ability_2.description: Throws a big ol boomerang that doesn't come back

super.name: Vape Juice Storm
super.description: Rapidly chucks balls of radioactive vape juice around himself while simultaneously retracting them, creating a whirlwind of vape juice

main_attack.name: Well Regulated Militia
main_attack.description: Fires a burst from his assault rifle

ability_1.name: Bear Strike
ability_1.description: James Madison unleashed a feral strike with his bear arms, dealing massive damage up close

ability_2.name: Amend
ability_2.description: James Madison signs off on his bill, marking an enemy for amendment. If their HP drops to a low enough percentage they are immediately killed

super.name: Double Jeopardy
super.description: James Madison grabs the nearest enemy and puts them in the game show Jeopardy. If they win once, he puts them in again and shoots them. If they lose they die

main_attack.name: Porthole throw
main_attack.description: Throws a porthole forward

ability_1.name: A Hole new world
ability_1.description: Porthole drops a porthole on the ground, slipping through it and popping back out 3 meters behind

ability_2.name: Portastic Port-mine
ability_2.description: Porthole drops a Porthole on the ground. The porthole is invisible to enemies, and slows them on contact (3 uses)

super.name: Underwater Genie
super.description:
Porthole summons Kneckakeckafallapulu, the underwater genie. He grants porthole one of three wishes, lasting for 20 seconds
True Glass Form: Porthole's shots reveal enemies and deal double damage
True Metal Form: Porthole's shots explode and deal area damage
True Porthole Form: Porthole's shots bounce between enemies

main_attack.name: Fightey Whiteys
main_attack.description: Throws random circus items from his coat, including a juggling pin, tricycle, cannonball, or â…— of a clown.

passive.name: Venomous Rage
passive.description: Does more damage the closer to death, or immediately after taking damage from a snake themed attack

ability_1.name: Bitey Fightey
ability_1.description: Bite in a wide area, stunning enemies caught and covering them in saliva

ability_2.name: Whitey Righty
ability_2.description: Any minority character gets constricted for 5 seconds, taking damage

super.name: Hide and go snake
super.description: 8 snakes spawn around Bitey Whiteys, when he finds them, they bite him, and increase his attack damage and lower cooldowns for 15 seconds. The snake bites do small damage

main_attack.name: Fry Up
main_attack.description: Deliver a mighty uppercut with both pans

ability_1.name: Mighty Magnet
ability_1.description: Iron Pan pulls an enemy towards him, dealing small damage

ability_2.name: Iron Spy
ability_2.description: Iron Pan drops a pan turret on the ground that flings rapid fire bacon at visible enemies

super.name: Royal Steel
super.description: Grab a humongous pan and slam it down in front of you 3 times, dealing area damage that scales with each hit

main_attack.name: Flap, Tackle, and Glop
main_attack.description: Footrun flaps his arms, Jetplace tackles forward and Junkrat shoots some fiery glop outta his crotch

ability_1.name: Switcherooski
ability_1.description: Switches to the next Triplet

ability_2.name: Character Development
ability_2.description: Footrun dashes forward, becoming invisible for a few seconds (2 uses). Jetplace uses his portals to teleport behind an enemy. Junkrat fires some larger missiles outta his crotch.

super.name: Into the Jetplace!
super.description: The triplets unite, joining hands and summoning a giant jetpack. They fly around the map dropping rockets outta his crotch and destruction.

main_attack.name: Tickle
main_attack.description: Tickle

ability_1.name: High 8
ability_1.description: Tickle Monster absolutely slaps somebody twice, first with the first five and then with the second 3

ability_2.name: Enhanced Peeling
ability_2.description: Can remove negative effects from himself and his teammates for a small amount of time

super.name: Tickle Train
super.description: Everybody in the area must board a train, specifically a tickle one, and gets violently tickled

main_attack.name: Clavi-kill
main_attack.description: Puts forth both shoulders one after another for a 2 hit melee combo. Matcha is gained with a hit

passive.name: Matcha Power
passive.description: The more matcha Shoulder Blade has, the more damage he does and takes reduced damage

ability_1.name: Rotator Cuff
ability_1.description: Spin in a circle that you can control, damaging enemies if you run into them for 10 seconds, gaining matcha.

ability_2.name: MAAAA CHAAAA
ability_2.description: Shoulder blade does a yell and drinks matcha, consuming what his matcha meter is at for health, can overheal, but only lasts 8 seconds

super.name: Shishoulder Kabob
super.description: Shoulder Blade dons a Nike Tek and shiesty, then dives at a targeted player, shouldering them all throughout the air, dealing damage and splash damage when they hit the ground

main_attack.name: Knee Combo
main_attack.description: Kicks in a wide range, knees forward

ability_1.name: Flying Bee Drop
ability_1.description: Jumps in the air and slams down with his knees forward, stinging enemies

ability_2.name: Float like a Butterfly
ability_2.description: Send a gust of air forward, creating an area of zero-gravity to trap enemies in

super.name: Sting like a Knee
super.description: Launches rapid-fire stingers from his knees that poison enemies

main_attack.name: Fantastic Fist-Feet Flurry
main_attack.description: A 4-hit combo where he punches and kicks

ability_1.name: Hands become feet
ability_1.description: Switches around his hands and feet, becoming more than just a man (also increases attack damage).

ability_2.name: You'll never know
ability_2.description: Handfoot switches his hands and feet so fast that he absorbs projectiles

super.name: Flick'a the Wrist
super.description: Handfoot enters flowstate, whirling hands and feet so fast while moving forward. He becomes an unstoppable juggernaut of damage and health

main_attack.name: Who Spiked the Punch?
main_attack.description: Floss punches, spikily

passive.name: Flossback
passive.description: Enemies take 1/32nd of all damage they inflict on floss via projectiles

ability_1.name: Absorption
ability_1.description: For the next 10 seconds, Floss takes 1/3rd of damage from projectiles

ability_2.name: Tease and Joke
ability_2.description: Floss gets demoralized by the other team for sucking, drawing their attention and firepower to him

super.name: Big Spike Thing
super.description: The Great Gatsby shoots Floss in the chest with a big spike thing. But then Floss shoots it back super fast out of him and it explodes

main_attack.name: Man Punch
main_attack.description: Man Guy punches with his long arm like a ma

passive.name: Manliness
passive.description: Man Guy gains increased max health whenever he takes damage, it resets when he dies

ability_1.name: Self Harm
ability_1.description: Man Guy deals damage to himself, increasing his attack

ability_2.name: Super Bones
ability_2.description: Man Guy boosts his bones, taking less damage for the next three secs

super.name: Guy Kick
super.description: Man Guy does a big kick,l that breaks his leg if he hits it he can do it again with more damage

main_attack.name: SLAMÎœÎŸ
main_attack.description: Chair Beard slammos down with his chair beard, slightly knocking enemies back

ability_1.name: Sit down and rest
ability_1.description: Chair Beard sits down, relaxes, and the positive vibes stop enemies from entering

ability_2.name: Whack Whack Whack
ability_2.description: Chair Beard whacks 3 times, and the 3rd hit sends enemies flying

super.name: Anything can be a chair
super.description: Chair Beard covers himself in his beard, effectively turning himself into a chair. All enemies in the radius sit on him and then get launched off at Mach 5

main_attack.name: Ultraviolet Umbrella
main_attack.description: Ultraviolet stabs with his umbrella, then opens it creating a small shield for 1 sec

ability_1.name: Lavender Lash
ability_1.description: Ultraviolet blinds the nearest enemy with his purpleness, blinding them

ability_2.name: Mount the Indigoat!
ability_2.description: Ultraviolet mounts the indigoat, gaining increased health and speed for 5 secs

super.name: Purpleness Explosion
super.description: Ultraviolet shines his purpleness, gaining a shield and taunting all nearby enemies into attacking him

main_attack.name: Squirt Gun
main_attack.description: Guy Yacht fires high pressure water from his squirt gun

ability_1.name: Bomboclat
ability_1.description: Guy Yacht flexes his cheeks, taking 80% less damage from behind for a 5 seconds

ability_2.name: Eyes up here
ability_2.description: Guy Yacht launches into the air and lands on his butt, buffing the defense of allies he lands around

super.name: Fantastic Plastic
super.description: Using the plastic in his veins, Guy Yacht hardens his entire body, taking overwhelmingly less damage from all sources

main_attack.name: Swole Wheat
main_attack.description: Yeast backhands both ways with the back of his hands

passive.name: Yeast
passive.description: Gains bread passively, or faster by dealing damage. Consuming bread with ALT increases damage and density

ability_1.name: Open Sesame
ability_1.description: Yeast throws a handful of sesame seeds in a short, wide range, stunning enemies

ability_2.name: RISE
ability_2.description: Increases bread gained from damage for 8 seconds

super.name: Gluten Tolerance
super.description: Become giant and bready for 30 seconds. Increases max health and knockback resistance. Can only use Swole Wheat, but it does more damage

main_attack.name: Clawsini Gatini
main_attack.description: Captain trumpet scratches twice with cat claws

ability_1.name: Shellala Shellalo
ability_1.description: Captain Trumpet gains a shield for 5 secs

ability_2.name: Rameo Chargeo
ability_2.description: Captain trumpet dashes forward with his ram horns

super.name: Trumpets Sounding
super.description:
Captain trumpet Gains a health boost and a random animal buff:
-Bunnini - Super jump
-Peacocko - Taunt at full health
-Sovereign Snakearms- Main Attack poisons

main_attack.name: Barbell strikenado
main_attack.description: Gym shark swings in a circle attacking enemies with his barbell

ability_1.name: Bulgarian tail squatnado
ability_1.description: Gym shark swings with his tail, all enemies that get hit move as if they are in water for 3 secs

ability_2.name: Sharknado
ability_2.description: Gym shark gets a space sharknado around him, he takes less damage and damages any enemies standing too close

super.name: ROIDNADO
super.description: Swims under ground and eats one person, killing them

main_attack.name: Get you by the Knife
main_attack.description: Captain Crunch Stabs enemies with his knife

ability_1.name: Oops all berries
ability_1.description: Captain Crunch spills berries on the ground, slowing enemies around him

ability_2.name: Crunch Surprise
ability_2.description: Captain crunch hides in a bush, and his next knife has a dash and does extra damage

super.name: Take you to his special island
super.description: Captain crunch Takes himself and the nearest enemy to his special island for 10 secs, where he has increased stats

main_attack.name: Grass Throw
main_attack.description: Jonnakiss throws grass, dealing more damage the closer the enemy is

ability_1.name: Sharp Grass
ability_1.description: Jonnakiss sharpens his grass so that it does max damage at all distances for the next three throws

ability_2.name: Thundercloud mode
ability_2.description: Jonnakiss quickly becomes a cloud then immediately shoots down in a lightning bolt, dealing massive damage

super.name: Eat the grass!
super.description: Jonnakiss eats his grass, turning him into a invincible cloud for 15 seconds, he comes down on the ground as it snows slowing enemies in his area

main_attack.name: CAW CAWWW
main_attack.description: A rapid, short range peck with infinite ammo

ability_1.name: WAAAA HEEY
ability_1.description: Red flings himself to a designated area with his slingshot, stunning enemies on land

ability_2.name: WOOOIA UUU UU UY
ability_2.description: Red slices in a wide berth with his wings, doing 50% of the max health of the squishiest enemy caught.

super.name: AAAAAIIIIIIAAA
super.description: Red perfectly mimics the sound of a bird, frightening Big Pig and sending him on a rampage through the map

main_attack.name: Dood Shood
main_attack.description: Voodude shoods his handgun, dealing small damage and marking with a voodoo mark on headshot

ability_1.name: Shank then Crank (feat. Spaceknife)
ability_1.description: Voodude dashes forward, and shanks the first enemy he hits with Spaceknife, and marking them with a voodoo mark which makes them take damage after 3 seconds that can be increased by attacking him. (3 uses)

ability_2.name: Dood Arrangement
ability_2.description: Voodude can arrange his dood into 5 different positions, each one with a different buff. He then throws the dude, teleporting to it on contact and in the position you choose.

super.name: If you ain't voo, then you ain't doo
super.description: Voodude imbues his dood with voo, then throws him, doing splash damage on contact, killing anyone with a voodoo mark or marking those who aren't marked yet.

main_attack.name: Ant-Rings
main_attack.description: Mute-Ant throws one of his ant-rings a short distance

ability_1.name: Ant-Bot
ability_1.description: Ant-Bot scans the area around him, revealing hidden objects and zapping enemies

ability_2.name: Ant-friend
ability_2.description: (In ant-form) Mute-Ant gets carried around by his insect friend; SeÃ±or butterfly, allowing him to fly for 8 secs

super.name: Ant-Man
super.description: Mute-ant speaks for 10 seconds transforming him into an ant that is so tiny it is invisible

main_attack.name: Tort for Four &
main_attack.description: Contortoise does a quick 4-hit combo, but strikes with unusual body part.

ability_1.name: Sneakcret Scuttle
ability_1.description: Contortoise drops to all fours and scuttles forward sneakcretly, gaining movement speed. This ability has no cooldown.

ability_2.name: Clack, Smack, Rattle
ability_2.description: Contortoise does all the aforementioned actions with his weird ahh joints, stunning the nearest enemy and delivering a smack for small damage.

super.name: Be Weird and Bend A Lot
super.description: Contortoise bends a lot in a wide area, jumping from enemy to enemy in the zone, grappling and dealing damage to them.

main_attack.name: Machete
main_attack.description: Machete Man slashes with his machete

ability_1.name: Machete Throw
ability_1.description: Machete man throws his machete then backflips to get a new one

ability_2.name: Dementia Machete Backflip
ability_2.description: Machete man does a backflip and has 50 chance of dealing a ton of damage to himself or an enemy

super.name: Old Guy Backflip
super.description: Machete man does a backflip, gaining an extra Mach e, extra damage and extra speed

main_attack.name: mmmâ€¦Stick
main_attack.description: Swings forward then up with his stick for a two-hit combo. Fills Scrooge meter faster

ability_1.name: Grupnotize
ability_1.description: Grup Scrooge raises his staff in the air to fake out enemies. They waste a random ability

ability_2.name: Centriscrooge
ability_2.description: Grup Scrooge spins around rapidly and deals damage, draining his Scrooge meter.

super.name: A Minute A Day Keeps the Doctor Away
super.description: Grup Scrooge places a marker anywhere on the map. In exactly one minute, a portal opens from wherever he is to there.

main_attack.name: Candy Spear
main_attack.description: Thrusts a sharpened candy cane forward, with long melee range and pierce

ability_1.name: The Dwindling Popularity of Wax Museums
ability_1.description: Launches a flaming Christingle, igniting enemies on hit and applying area burn damage

ability_2.name: The Importance of Dentists
ability_2.description: Captain Christingle switches his candy canes for toothpicks, allowing him to throw up to 4 for less damage.

super.name: The Fashion Industry
super.description: Captain Christingle binds all enemies in a target location, forcing them together and rooting them

main_attack.name: Double Spatula Surprise
main_attack.description: Burger King makes burgers, LT to make funky burgers for teammates, RT to make evil burgers for enemies.

ability_1.name: The Great
ability_1.description: Burger King makes a big burger, providing cover for teammates and can be consumed for health.

ability_2.name: The Gatsby
ability_2.description: Burger King draws a spatula circle, creating a burger zone for teammates to gain increased attack in.

super.name: The Great and The Gatsby
super.description: Burger King Greats a Gatsby Burger, turning any teammate into the Great Gatsby for 1 minute. While the Great Gatsby, teammates have much more health and damage.

main_attack.name: Shock Therapy
main_attack.description: DFB shoots a constant beam of lightning from his hand, sucking health from enemies

ability_1.name: Defribrilate
ability_1.description: DFB shoots a little lightning out, which does minimal damage and cancels enemies abilities for 5 seconds

ability_2.name: Refribrilate
ability_2.description: DFB shocks a Wednesday teammate, giving them a shield, raising their attack damage, and healing them for 5 seconds (3 uses)

super.name: If it's Wednesday, they will come
super.description: Place down an area of pure Wednesday, reviving any teammate who most recently died, and reviving any teammate who dies within the zone. The zone exists for 30 seconds

main_attack.name: I'm Not Having Fun
main_attack.description: Brainfreeze, shocked at the prospect of not fun, swings out with a one-handed punch, gaining Fun on hit.

ability_1.name: Use the Bomb
ability_1.description: Costs 2 Fun. Brainfreeze finally uses the bomb he always carries around, dealing small splash damage.

ability_2.name: You Fly When I'm Having Fun
ability_2.description: Costs 1 Fun. Brainfreeze can levitate a teammate, healing them and raising them to any height for 5 seconds.

super.name: Time Flies When Your Having Fun
super.description: Brainfreeze takes a hit of straight Fun, causing himself to enter a state of bliss, summoning Time Flies to tell him and his teammates the time in game and in real life for 30 seconds

main_attack.name: Frog Bomb
main_attack.description: Speedo lobs a negatively charged bullfrog that explodes on hit. The shot becomes more horizontal the longer its held down

ability_1.name: Fresh Pair
ability_1.description: Speedo dons a speedo, increasing all nearby teammate's speed for 5 seconds. (Significantly more if they're a bullfrog)

ability_2.name: Dredge You Glad I Put a Bog There
ability_2.description: Speedo places a portable bog down, allowing teammates to dredge through, but not enemies

super.name: Bullfrogs Unite!
super.description: Speedo sends forth a tsunami of super fast bullfrogs, dealing damage to any enemy and giving bonus health to any teammate they pass through.

main_attack.name: Didgeridon't Come Near
main_attack.description: Didgeridon't swings his Didgeridon't in a wide arc, causing fall damage on hit.

ability_1.name: Didgeridon't Mess Around
ability_1.description: Didgeridon't stretches his arms, increasing super charge rate for 5 seconds.

ability_2.name: Digerididn't and Digeriwon't
ability_2.description: Didgeridon't summons the ghosts of Digeripast and the ghost of digerifuture to perform a line dance. They are solid and can block attacks.

super.name: Didgeridon't Take Fall Damage
super.description: Didgeridon't raises his Didgeridon't above his head, and for 15 seconds his teammates don't take fall damage.

main_attack.name: North, East, South, West
main_attack.description: Launch a cardinal that splits on hit, shooting 4 cardinals in the 4 cardinal directions. Heals teammates and damages enemies

ability_1.name: Translucify
ability_1.description: The Corn Maiden touches a teammate, turning them kinda translucent and giving them healing over time

ability_2.name: Opacify
ability_2.description: The Corn Maiden touches an enemy, making them twice as opaque and increasing their hitbox for 5 seconds

super.name: Cornpast, Cornpresent, Cornfuture
super.description: The Corn Maiden attaches a translucent cardinal to all visible teammates, applying constant healing over time until the cardinals are destroyed

main_attack.name: Womanly Plate Throw
main_attack.description: DishwasHER throws a plate in a female-like manner

ability_1.name: Cass HERole
ability_1.description: DishwasHER drops a casserole that heals her teammates

ability_2.name: Stealth Mode
ability_2.description: DishwasHER goes into stealth mode, getting melee whisk weapons and changing her outfit which does nothing

super.name: Do the Laundry
super.description: DishwasHER removes all negative effects from her teammates and heals them significantly

main_attack.name: Laser Taser Blaser Face
main_attack.description: Power point shoots a laser at an enemies face. If the enemy is wearing a blaser, it does double damage

ability_1.name: Minor Blind
ability_1.description: PowerPoint temporarily blinds one enemy, leaving a 'blind spot' where they can't see for 5 seconds

ability_2.name: 3rd D vision
ability_2.description: PowerPoint sees through the first and the second D's, and him and his teammates can see enemies wherever they are on the map

super.name: Super Distract
super.description: Power point summons a random point on the map, and all other characers are sucked towards that point and can only see near that point

main_attack.name: Autissles
main_attack.description: Shan't fires mini-missiles from his wheelchair

ability_1.name: Wheelchair Tow
ability_1.description: Shan't attaches his wheelchair to another teammate, significantly boosting their movement speed

ability_2.name: Wheel Steel
ability_2.description: Shan't shoots a wheel off of his wheelchair, providing cover for teammates behind them (2 uses)

super.name: Motivational JUMP
super.description: Shan't, after charging all game, performs the biggest jump you've seen any guy do before. This incredible morale boost gives all teammates in the area incredible jump height, regeneration, and healing over time

main_attack.name: Double Snowball
main_attack.description: Snow Angel throws two snowballs, dealing extra damage if they both hit

passive.name: Cold Aura
passive.description: Snow Angel slows down all enemies that are too close to him, due to his creepy and cold hearted nature

ability_1.name: SnowBlade Beyblade
ability_1.description: Snow Angel spins around, freezing enemies with his icy wings

ability_2.name: Snow Angel Effect
ability_2.description: Snow Angel rolls a giant snowball in front of him, it gets bigger and does more damage as it rolls

super.name: Under the Snow
super.description: Snow Angel dives into the snow and can fly under it for 6 secs, during this time he is immune and everyone standing above him gets increased attack damage

main_attack.name: Shovel Slash
main_attack.description: Faceplant attacks with shovel, dealing heavy melee damage and launching weaker vines out in front of him

ability_1.name: Face full of Plant
ability_1.description: Faceplant Excretes a large amount of poisonous pollen from his face

ability_2.name: Plant full of Face
ability_2.description: Faceplant creates an area of plants who encourage his teammates, giving bonus attack and speed

super.name: Plant full of Plant
super.description: Faceplant creates an area that wraps enemies up vines, stunning them

main_attack.name: Bud Go Boom!
main_attack.description: Grom throws his walkie-talkie over obstacles at a long range that explodes into four piercing projectiles in a cross pattern.

ability_1.name: Watchtower
ability_1.description: Upon activation, Grom drops a turret that allows him and allies to see enemies inside bushes in its 10-tile radius.

ability_2.name: Radio Check
ability_2.description: Activating this Gadget allows Grom's next attack to fire three walkie-talkies in quick succession.

super.name: Grom Bomb
super.description: Grom throws a giant, longer-ranged bomb from his back over obstacles that explodes into four piercing projectiles in a cross pattern, similarly to his main attack.

main_attack.name: Baguette
main_attack.description: She uses her baguette to hit

ability_1.name: Hucked Mime
ability_1.description: Jeanne Gris hucks a mime over walls and buildings

ability_2.name: Invisible Wall
ability_2.description: Jeanne Gris' mime makes a wall that protects her for a short time

super.name: Horde-a-mimes
super.description: Jeanne Gris controls a horde of mimes and tramples anyone in her path

main_attack.name: Super Snowglober
main_attack.description: Winter Wondergirl throws a snow globe, which breaks and pulls enemies in

ability_1.name: Shake it up
ability_1.description: Winter Wondergirl makes it snow around her, freezing enemies

ability_2.name: Rain down the sun fog
ability_2.description: Winter Wondergirl breaks a snowglobe with a lot of fog, causing a smoke bomb

super.name: Wonderlate the multisphere
super.description: Winter Wondergirl builds a giant snow globe, any enemies in it take a ton of damage and are slowed

main_attack.name: Krazy Karate Kicks
main_attack.description: SGCW kicks with a three kick combo

ability_1.name: Super Ultra Tornado Spin
ability_1.description:
Ninja Mode - SGCW does a stunning spin kick 
Turtle Mode - SGCW spins around in her turtle shell and is invincible throughout

ability_2.name: Mega Tsunami Cheesecake
ability_2.description:
Ninja Mode - SGCW dashes forward spilling slowing cheesecake behind her
Turtle Mode - SGCW consumes her cheesecake to gain health and movement speed

super.name: Supersaiyan Ultra Cheesecake Weapon Ninja Gurl Explosion!
super.description: SGCW switches to the other mode. Ninja Mode has low health and high speed. Turtle mode has low speed high health. SGCW gets a attack boost after switching

main_attack.name: Taste the belt
main_attack.description: Belt Tungus flings his belt out of his mouth in front of him

ability_1.name: Oil Spill
ability_1.description: Does an oopsie and spill oil all over behind him. Enemies can't walk well due to the frictionless surface

ability_2.name: Rev it
ability_2.description: Bet Tungus revs his engines, dashing forward and stunning enemies

super.name: Carb
super.description: Belt Tungus adds a B to his head, becoming a carbohydrate and making up to 3 visible enemies fat and slow. They have to walk off the effect to get rid of it

main_attack.name: Hawk Spawn
main_attack.description: Moonhawk spawns a hawk outta his forearm

passive.name: Ability 4
passive.description: Question 1) If a train is departing a station at 6 miles per hour, its distance is 35 miles away, and the coefficient of friction is 0.68, will the passengers enjoy the ride?

ability_1.name: 2nd ability
ability_1.description: This is Moonhawk's 2nd ability, don't get them confused

ability_2.name: 3rd Place Ability: ðŸ¥‰
ability_2.description: This ability came in 3rd place, and got a bronze medal

super.name: Moonhawk resets the game
super.description: All characters watch as the moon becomes a waxing gibbous, entering them all into a cutscene of changing moon phases while hundreds of hawks fly the coop, resetting Moonhawk's cooldowns and unmuting him from voice chat

main_attack.name: Drop a cow
main_attack.description: They had the opportunity to drop a cow once in his life, but he didn't take it, and now he has crippling regrets

ability_1.name: Be very very wary of this ability
ability_1.description: They is too wary of this ability and can't use it.

ability_2.name: Bi-Polar
ability_2.description: Uh Oh! Looks like someone said They! They gains A random personality that includes: Doctor, Female Doctor, Lumberjack, Tree, Female Tree, Botanist, or The Onceler.

super.name: Them
super.description: IMAGE:images/TheySuper.png
